Package it.polimi.ingsw.Controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Controller.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
This class represents the Controller module in the MVC pattern.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameController

      public GameController(Game game)
      GameController constructor.
      Parameters:
      game - the game model of the ongoing match.

  • Method Details

    • onMessage

      public void onMessage(PlayerMoveMessage message)
      Receives a Message from the ClientHandler and calls model method in order to update the game state based on the messageType.
      Parameters:
      message - the message received, it represents a move of a player.

    • addPlayerToGame

      public void addPlayerToGame(String nickname, GamePreferencesMessage preferences, Boolean newGame)
      Method called by the server, it permits to add a player to an existing game when newGame is set false or to create one when newGame is set true.
      Parameters:
      nickname - nickname of the player who is joining the game.
      preferences - number of players and the game mode the player chose to play with.
      newGame - boolean variable that permits to know if it's required to add the player to a new game or not

    • getActualNumberOfPlayers

      public int getActualNumberOfPlayers()
      Getter method for the actual number of players of the game.
      Returns:
      ActualNumberOfPlayers.

    • isExpertMode

      public boolean isExpertMode()
      Getter method for the of the game.
      Returns:
      the game mode.

    • getNumberOfPlayers

      public int getNumberOfPlayers()
      Getter method for the number of players of the game.
      Returns:
      the number of players.

    • isGameEnded

      public boolean isGameEnded()
      Getter method for the end of the game.
      Returns:
      true whether the game has ended, else false.
